name: Park Tool BBT-90.3 Press Fit Bottom Bracket Bearing Tool
categories: BBT-90.3 Press Fit Bottom Bracket Bearing Too
description: This precision tool removes several types of press fit bottom brackets. Slide the tool through the bearing until the flared end snaps beind the tool, tap the oppsite end to remove the bearing. To re-install, use the included bushings in conjuction with a bearing press (not-included) and voilà.Designed for BB90, BB92, Shimano® press fit, SRAM® press fit GXP®, Race Face® press fit and other press fit bottom bracket systems.Includes one bearing removal tool and two (2) bushings for installation.
